hero.heading: Admissions
hero.text: Get help for yourself or a loved one today!

cta.heading: Start Your Journey To Recovery Today
cta.text: Are you or a loved one struggling with addiction? Discover Health Group is here to help you take the first step towards a healthier, happier life. Our compassionate team is ready to support you through every stage of your recovery journey. Contact us today to learn more about our programs, schedule a visit, or start the admissions process. Your path to recovery begins here.

steps.title: Pre-Screening Clinical Assessment
steps.text: Conduct a phone assessment to determine program fit and provide necessary information for prospective patients.
steps.modalText: Further details about the pre-screening process and requirements.

steps.title: Treatment Program And Care Evaluation
steps.text: Evaluate pre-screening results to determine the appropriate treatment program and level of care using ASAM criteria.
steps.modalText: Additional information about treatment program evaluation.

steps.title: Payment Options For Treatment
steps.text: Explore insurance and self-pay options to cover the cost of treatment.
steps.modalText: Details about different payment options available.

steps.title: Get Ready for Your Upcoming Stay
steps.text: Pack appropriately and follow guidelines to ensure a comfortable and compliant stay.
steps.modalText: Details on what to bring and how to prepare.

nextSteps.heading: Some next steps you can take
nextSteps.description: Learn more about Valley Spring Recovery Center

nextSteps.title: How does Sober Living Placement work?

pdf.heading: Download our White Paper
pdf.description: Empower Your Journey, Embrace Your Potential!

faq.title: What is Medication-Assisted Treatment?
faq.details: Medication-Assisted Treatment (MAT) involves using medication, along with counseling and behavioral therapies, to treat substance use disorders.

faq.title: How does Sober Living Placement work?
faq.details: Sober Living Placement helps individuals find safe and supportive housing environments where they can continue their recovery journey.

faq.title: What services are included in Case Management?
faq.details: Case Management includes resume building, job search assistance, accessing community resources, and more.
